entry.title: Monday: Snow. High 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 20 this afternoon. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
